div.sent: The mother hen, whenever she finds some food, makes a particular sound from her throat.
Hearing that sound, the little chicks come running to their mother for feeding.
Hearing that sound, the chicks quickly hide themselves in safe places.
You may be surprised to know that even insects send information to each other.
When a bee finds a fl ower garden, it immediately goes back to its hive.
They cannot think of new ways of communicating information.
But it is different with men.
Men are constantly trying to find newer ways to communicate information.
You will be surprised to learn about all these means of information communication.
You must have understood by now what is meant by information.
News or knowledge about anything is information.
To live we constantly need to learn new information.
A farmer needs to know how to drain water into his land.
A factory worker has to know how to run the machines in the factory.
A student is all the time getting new information from his or her books.
And this information is scattered all around us in various ways.
We look for and find the information as we need it.
Scientists do research work on it and find the medicine for its treatment.
And a new piece of information is born in the world.
Thousands of people will perhaps then die in the cyclone.
The people can move away to safer places or go to the shelter centres.
So, you see that information can save the lives of thousands of people.
But, it is important to communicate the information for that.
We can see many examples of information communication around us.
In the modern world, information communication is a very important subject.
Earlier we didn't have so many different ways of communicating information as we have now.
The information would reach others as fast as the person could go to them.
No complicated messages could be sent in these ways.
There were no ways to send information to many people at the same time.
After the plane was invented, people could send information much faster than before.
In 1837, a significant change happened in the field of information communication.
This technique is known as Telegraph.
People started to send information through telegraph.
Technology is the use of science.
Science is knowledge and knowledge can never be bad.
But technology can be good or bad.
However, man has for the most part used technology for the good of man.
Information technology is a good example of that.
At first, only one word at a time could be sent through telegraph.
Telephone wire is needed to be installed to make the telephone work.
So, the scientists started experiments to find out if information could be sent without wires.
This technology is known as wireless.
Gradually a lot of improvements have been made in this technology.
Using this technology, we have found the television.
Scientists and technologists have started to link one computer with another.
This is called computer network.
People across the world can now exchange information with each other through computer network.
This is known as internet.
Internet is considered as the most significant technology of the new world.
This new form of information technology is changing our world in new ways everyday.
Have you taken part in this new change?
Do you want to take part?
